# [Interview #632: Alloy of Law Signing Report - Wetlandernw, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=632#3)

#### Wetlandernw

Was the scruffy-looking "beggar in black" guy at the wedding dinner Hoid?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
